uniol.apt.adt.ts

Class Arc

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.adt.extension.Extensible
      • uniol.apt.adt.Edge<TransitionSystem,Arc,State>
        • uniol.apt.adt.ts.Arc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExtensible, IEdge<TransitionSystem,Arc,State>

    public class Arc
extends Edge<TransitionSystem,Arc,State>
    Arcs serve as edges in a TransitionSystem. They have a source node's id, a target node's id and a label.
    Author:
    Dennis-Michael Borde, Manuel Gieseking
